title: Threesome Play
description: When opportunity comes, grab it. Or them.Cara Wilson just wants what her best friend has—a good man to love and who loves her back, and maybe the occasional threesome with another man for some excitement in the bedroom.When two gorgeous hunks move in next door, her chance has come! The hot sex that follows a sweaty car wash proves she’s got it in hand (and mouth and…) What can go wrong?Everything.Product Warnings: This book contains explicit sexual situations, graphic language, male/male sexual acts, anal sex and ménage a trois (m/f/m and m/m/f).Word Count: 14,175 words
author: Sienna Matthews
